scripts.lint: eslint --config .config/eslint.config.js js/main.js js/page.js js/pageData.js js/images.js js/diary.js js/ogod.js js/analytics.js js/config.js js/audioPlayer.js js/videoPlayer.js js/nameSearch.js js/namingAPI.js js/namingStrategies.js js/loophole.js js/sketch.js js/3d/ui/*.js js/living-pantheon/*.js js/media/**/*.js js/ergasterion/*.js js/ogod/utils/*.js
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --config .config/eslint.config.js js/main.js js/page.js js/pageData.js js/images.js js/diary.js js/ogod.js js/analytics.js js/config.js js/audioPlayer.js js/videoPlayer.js js/nameSearch.js js/namingAPI.js js/namingStrategies.js js/loophole.js js/sketch.js js/3d/ui/*.js js/living-pantheon/*.js js/media/**/*.js js/ergasterion/*.js js/ogod/utils/*.js --fix
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test
scripts.build:exhibits: npm run build:audio-orb && npm run build:ink-studio && npm run build:p5js-playground && npm run build:synthwave-space
scripts.build:audio-orb: cd absorb-alchemize/audio-orb && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ink-studio: cd absorb-alchemize/gemini-ink-studio && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:p5js-playground: cd absorb-alchemize/p5js-playground && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:synthwave-space: cd absorb-alchemize/synthwave-space && npm install && npm run build
